name: Coco Vase L
description: The Coco Vase Large is a classic and elegant piece with its quilted details. Also available in a Medium size. It is made from Black Pen Shell or Shagreen, bronze-patina brass and is handmade. The interior of KIFU PARIS vases can support water. All shagreen-covered items should be kept out of direct sunlight, color variants may occur on the stingray and other exotic finishes, but this showcases the Parisian label's commitment to creating authentic luxurious products using natural components.
